title: Blocked Everything ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜‘
content: Enjoy guys ðŸ˜‚ blocked everything except pesu academy... Even github and vs extensions  are blocked. .. WELCOME TO PESU ðŸ˜‚

comments.body:
I guess you need to login on some portal with some credentials, that will trigger session on firewall (in this case it's sophos) then you can browse internet.

EDIT: Try to visit http://neverssl.com, then it will redirect you to that particular login portal
You clearly didn't login to the sophos internet portal

Welcome to PESU
NO VPN WILL WORK
EARLIER CLOUD FLARE WARP USED TO WORK, NOW EVEN THAT DOESN'T WORK.

That's becoz, initially WARP doesn't works as a VPN, it's just a DNA resolver ( 1.1.1.1 ), but few months back the policies are changed and now it completely acts as a VPN ( internally it uses wiregaurd )
Didn't PESU have some wifi SSID named **eduroam** ?
Are you sure you're logged in on the portal? It lets you access pesuacademy even without logging in but you need to be logged in to access anything else.
Not sure idk
Damn, warp was so good, RIP

And btw i dont think GitHub and vs code extensions are banned, u just didnt login to ur portal cause probably u dont have the password till now. U need to sign in to 192.168.254.1 after connecting to wifi

> It lets you access pesuacademy even without logging in

Yes, that's the obvious behavior, becoz the web server ( pesuacademy ) is hosted somewhere in the campus, and that's reply back to your browser request.

>but you need to be logged in to access anything else.

You need to login becoz it will create a session on firewall ( RN firewall is blocking user to go outside the internal network, if the session is created and once user entry is saved then firewall allow him/her to access internet and all the user activities are been logged by firewall ).
Use TOR , solves everything lol.Â
Use TOR bruh.Â
You can even manage to bypass things if you find some loopholes in the network xD
Ahh , missing the golden days

>192.168.254.1

Wait!! You guys don't have ip address starting with 10.0.0.0/8 ?
No, just login to 192.168.254.1 ( type manually in browser) should open the portal and login when u have the password ðŸ”‘
Go study dsa
VPNs work dawg

Openvpn + tcpvpn
